bug.author: haifeng-jin
bug.summary: in search.py train() function, handle other exceptions and log the error
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Bug Description</denchmark-h>
Any error occurred in the train() function should not block the search. The search should just discard the current architecture and search for new ones. <denchmark-h:h3>Reproducing Steps</denchmark-h>
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Step 1: ... Step 2: ...
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected Behavior</denchmark-h>
Any exception, they should all return None, None, None. And should all push (None, None, None) into the queue. <denchmark-h:h3>Setup Details</denchmark-h>
Include the details about the versions of:
OS type and version: Python: autokeras: scikit-learn: numpy: keras: scipy: tensorflow: pytorch:
<denchmark-h:h3>Additional context</denchmark-h>
